blocks.title: Forestry's Gatsby Demo
blocks.subtitle: A Gatsby Starter Built for Forestry

blocks.title: A CMS for your Gatsby Project
blocks.content: Forestry gives content writers a user-friendly editing experience

blocks.title: Build a Site in Minutes
blocks.content: Our Gatsby starter is pre-configured with support for markdown, and of course works great with Forestry's CMS.

blocks.title: Instant Previews
blocks.content: Forestry's new instant previews feature dramatically reduces preview build times, giving you a tighter feedback loop.

col1.title: Content Lives in Git
col1.content: Content updates are saved to your git repo, so they can by synchronized across all environments

col2.title: Customizable CMS
col2.content: Forestry easily adapts to your content structure, not the other way around.

col3.title: Blocks Page Builder
col3.content: Use blocks to give editors the power to build dynamic pages - like this one!

blocks.title: Create Your Own Gatsby Site
blocks.subtitle: Use our quick start to import this demo into Forestry
